data.text: Na Hiob buae se,
“Akyinnye nni ho, mo ne nnipa no
Nanso mewɔ adwene sɛ mo ara
“Mayɛ aserewde ama me nnamfonom,
Nnipa a wɔn ho tɔ wɔn no bu amanehunu animtiaa
Wɔmmfa wɔn nsa nka akorɔmfo ntamadan,
“Bisa mmoa no, na wɔbɛkyerɛ wo
anaasɛ kasa kyerɛ asase, na ɛbɛkyerɛ wo,
Wɔn nyinaa mu hena na onnim sɛ
Ne nsam na abɔde nyinaa home wɔ
So aso nsɔ nsɛm nhwɛ
Wonnya nyansa mfi mpanyin nkyɛn,
“Nyansa ne tumi yɛ Onyankopɔn de;
Nea obubu gu no, obiara rentumi nsi;
Sɛ ɔma osu gyae tɔ a, asase no so yɛ wosee;
Ahoɔden ne nkonimdi yɛ ne de
Ɔpa afotufo ho ntama ma wɔkɔ
Ɔworɔw ahemfo nkyehama
Ɔpa asɔfo ho ntama,
Ɔka afotufo a wogye wɔn di no kasaboa hyɛ,
Ɔde animguase gu atitiriw so
Ɔda sum mu nneɛma a ahintaw adi
Ɔyɛ aman akɛse, na ɔsɛe wɔn;
Ogye wiase akannifo adwene fi wɔn nsam;
Wɔkeka wɔ sum mu a wonni kanea;
